nodes.bodyText: so we are using a random number just to cause the state to change here?  Really has no meaning just counting on it to be different?

+          this.setState({ regionComponentKey: Math.random() }) //Forces re-render of the MarionetteRegionContainer

nodes.bodyText: Basically, yes, without it the component will not change so no re-render. But it's also a React component key so there is that.
